title: FIFA 14
description: The Games on Demand version supports English, French, and Spanish.  Download the manual for this game by going to https://help.ea.com/en/tag/manuals and selecting your title from the Product drop down menu.  Feel the emotion of scoring great goals in FIFA 14. The game plays the way great football matches are contested, with innovations to the award-winning gameplay that inspire fans to build  play through midfield, dictating the tempo of a match.  Feel the tension as chances are created, and experience the thrill of hitting the back of the net. A new feature called Pure Shot and a brand-new ball physics system will transform shooting, making every shot attempt feel real, and when players connect with the perfect strike, feel exhilarating. FIFA 14 delivers engaging online features and live services that connect fans to the heartbeat of the sport—and to each other—through EA SPORTS Football Club. FIFA 14 is football's social network, where fans connect, compete and share with millions of others around the world.

contentRating.label: E (Everyone)
disclaimers: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB

childDownloads.title: FIFA 14 Official Gameplay Trailer
childDownloads.description: FIFA 14 is out on 24 September 2013 in North America and 27 September in Europe. See the new gameplay features like Pure Shot and Real Ball Physics.

childDownloads.title: FIFA 14 Ultimate Team Legends Bonus Commentary
childDownloads.description: EA SPORTS brings 42 legendary footballers like Pelé, Viera, and Gullit, to FIFA 14 Ultimate Team.	The FIFA 14 Ultimate Team Legends Bonus Commentary DLC is completely free and enhances the Legends content with additional colour commentary and more!  This DLC is not required to play with Legends in FIFA 14 Ultimate Team.
